name: 吳星佑
objective:
光機系統應用極為廣泛，無論是天文、航太、軍事、醫療、半導體、加速器等高階系統，或講究快速與需價格競爭力之手機、車載、智慧監控等商品，皆仰賴札實的光學與機械知識以確立系統設計滿足需求。本課程內容特別挑選重要的光學與機械做解析外，搭配光學設計軟體、Matlab 模擬以及應用實例還有最重要的「實作」以強化重要觀念，並使學生建立相關知解決工程問題與創新能力，並進一步確立興趣與發展方向為主要目標。
Optical mechanical systems have changed the world and they will continue to do so. The course of optical machinery designed practice aims to be a solution provider for high-end customers in astronomy, aerospace, military, accelerator, and medicine. Also the knowledge can satisfy mass production industries of mobile, automobile, and machine vision. To meet that need, not only does the course introduce core knowledge in optics and mechanics but also practice modeling and case studies to enhance the capability of problem solving and innovation. The subject makes possible to initiating students’ interest in the optical mechanical industry so as to make it as their future careers.
schedule:
根據授課大綱，前 4 周為基礎觀念建立，其中 4 周為光學模擬、8 周為實作、剩餘 2 周為期末報告。
According to Syllabus, 1-4 weeks: bask knowledge. 4 weeks for modelging, 8 weeks for practice and the rest of 2 weeks for oral presentation and report.
scorePolicy: (1) 課程參與 40%(2) 提問 10%(3) 期末報告 20%(4) 期末上台報告 30%。class attendance (40%). question asking (10%). report (20%) and oral presentation (30%) for final.
